thread.section_title: ShoeDazzle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ShoeDazzle | www.shoedazzle.com
thread.title: Val

author: Val
title: Val
text: My boots were gorgeous, I already left reviews for those on the show dazzle website...my shirt however was not what I expected! It's supposed to be 80% cotton 20%nylon and yet it feels like paper and is super thin. It's still a beautiful shirt and i will wear it but I don't believe the materials are listed correctly or the item listing accurate. It should state that the fabric is very rough and scratchy not soft as described. I've even washed it 2x with fabric softener before wearing and it did not help. The material is def not cotton.
